about_the_game:
Joe the cat always wondered what lies beyond the harbor limits. What adventures await him, now he decides to board that cargo ship!?

Focused on the beauty of the levels, an inspiring original soundtrack, and a short story that involves the player, Joe's Expedition - Jigsaw Landscapes, takes you on a relaxing and surprising experience, with:

  • Gorgeous scenes of Jigsaw Puzzles.
  • A stunning story about discovering the wolrd trough the eyes of a cat.
  • A Unique New mechanic that takes you into the scene after each puzzle.

For Jigsaw Puzzle lovers, this game has the best of its genre:


  • Complete 6 Jigsaw Puzzle scenes at 5 levels of dificulty.
  • Enjoy a minimalist interface that helps you focus on the puzzle.
  • Use great gameplay functions that make the experience even better.
  • Relax with an original Soundtrack for each level!

For any players who enjoy a beautiful experience, the game is way more immersive than other games of its genre!


With each puzzle assembled, the player is taken to a live scene in 2.5D, where it is possible to discover more about the story behind the game, in addition to finding more achievements from Steam.

AND also, 2 Bonus levels, that blend Jigsaw Puzzle with the 2.5D scene!

Key Features:


  • Zoom
  • Highlight edges pieces
  • Preview scene
  • Change Background
  • Shuffle pieces
  • Focus Mode
  • Auto Save the Puzzles

name: Joe is not lost - Jigsaw Landscapes
short_description: Follow the first adventure of Joe the cat, far away from home, in a unique and sweet Jigsaw Puzzle. What awaits you when you set the last piece?
